Class representing a Connect API client

Source: R/connect.R
RStudioConnect.Rd

Class representing a Connect API client

Class representing a Connect API client

Usage

client <- Connect$new(host = 'connect.example.com',
  apiKey = 'mysecretkey')
client$get_apps()
client$get_tags()

Details

This class allows a user to interact with a Connect server via the Connect API. Authentication is done by providing an API key.

See also

Other R6 classes: Bundle, Content, Task, Vanity, VariantTask

Method clone()

The objects of this class are cloneable with this method.

Usage

Connect$clone(deep = FALSE)

Arguments

deep

Whether to make a deep clone.
